column1: Uchi////Been here a few times now. Food and service are always excellent. Reservations recommended. The menu can be overwhelming as there's a lot to choose from
column2: and if you are not familiar with Japanese cuisine/terms
column3: but still don't worry there is a great knowledgeable staff who will describe to you everything and will help you to order what your there for. What I had there
column4: everything was amazing and will prepared. Environment was clean and I felt so safe while eating there.
